ARGUMENT
z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nfabd.1 | |- F/ y ph |

| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_nfcd | |- ( ph -> F/_ x { y | ps } ) |
